kw.name: Open DepFlow Application
kw.doc: Opens the DepFlow application in browser

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Quick admin login using test mode

kw.name: Test Mode Login
kw.doc: Login using test mode bypass - no modal interaction required

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.arg: console.error('Test mode login function not available');

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Verify Test Mode State
kw.doc: Verify test mode state and return information

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close DepFlow Application
kw.doc: Closes the browser and cleans up

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
